name: Slimmunition
description:
Play as a slime in this 2D Top-Down shooter where you must save other slimes! Shoot enemies by using your own health as ammunition.  This is your Slimmunition!

Controls:  WASD to Move - Left Click to Shoot

Made for the Winter 2022 ISU Game Jam with the theme, "You are a resource".

All art assets, audio and programming were done by Trey (GaoGames).
